extendedInfo.description: EXERCISE 1: FACIAL WARM UPGet the FREE Faceworks Natural Facelift App first to access to this exercise.BENEFITS                                                                                                                                                                                 This exercise warms and tones the muscles in the face: specifically the cheeks, lips, jaw and and neck - Works deep muscles at the base of the tongue -Stimulates blood flow to the deep layers of the skin.PARTNER EXERCISES FOR CHEEKS: Numbers 6,10 and 12INSTANT BOOSTER EXERCISES: Numbers 3, 6, 7, 8, 11 and 12                                                                                                                                               If youâre looking tired, or need to look great fast, use the Instant Booster Exercises to make your eyes sparkle, plump your lips and get your skin glowing! For firm, smooth and healthy skin, Faceworks is the best skin product you can buy.In client trials 100% of people who completed the recommended program saw an improvement in their appearance with Faceworks.
